name: Dream of Malpheus
description:
A second-person weight gain Interactive Story starring FatBluDragons OC Malpheus. The Dream Eating and Feeding Gengar! First iteration of the game. With one complete ending. Other endings pending. This is a part of a bigger project set in the same location. With other characters you can interact with. 

Game is SFW, but suggestive. A gay weight gain story. If you have any questions about the location of the story, go to my twitter @MichaBlade. If you have questions about the game, you can ask here or at my furaffinity account, MichaVoidDragon.

If people like this enough, I can add a third person mode and other character encounters.
